info.name: X4 material style theme
info.description:
The classic theme is good enough, but we can make it different
The theme is mainly built upon X4 palette.
info.additionalInfo:
v1.03
- minor changes

v1.02
- updated topic title theme
- added rounded border to post title
- changed header background
- added more details to profile section
- removed underline of some anchor tags

v1.01 
- updated profile username hyperlink color
- added more details to profile rank section
- removed margins of page header
- optimized some visual visibilities
